nodes.text: Back to Basics (French: Retour aux sources) is a chapter book adaptation of the Star Wars Rebels episodes "The Protector of Concord Dawn" and "Legends of the Lasat". Back to Basics was published by Hachette Jeunesse on November 30, 2016.

Two new missions are announced for the Rebels of Lothal! As Sabine leaves for the Concord Dawn system in an attempt to rally a Mandalorian colony to her cause, Zeb discovers the existence of two Lasats who, like him, survived the elimination of his people. They are looking for Lira San, a legendary planet on which the Lasats could make a new start.
